name: VersionDacpac
description: Applies specified version number to all dacpac files in target folder
author: Black Marble

inputs.name: Path
inputs.label: Source folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Source folder for dacpac files, can be root as it will find all dacpacs recursively

inputs.name: VersionNumber
inputs.label: Version Number
inputs.helpMarkDown: Version number to apply to files, should be in format that matches Regex expression (in advanced settings)

inputs.name: ToolPath
inputs.label: ToolPath
inputs.helpMarkDown: The path to the folder containing the files Microsoft.SqlServer.Dac.dll and Microsoft.SqlServer.Dac.Extensions.dll. This path will be used in precedence to paths found using the automatic scan path

inputs.name: InjectVersion
inputs.label: Inject Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: If True no regex processing will be done to the build number.

inputs.name: VersionRegex
inputs.label: Regex Filter
inputs.helpMarkDown: Regular expression filter build number from name.

inputs.name: VSVersion
inputs.label: Visual Studio Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: A filter for the Visual Studio version to scan for the SQL DAC SDK e.g 2017, 2015, 2022. if not set will scan for all versions and the newest used.

inputs.name: SDKVersion
inputs.label: DAC SDK Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: A filter for the SQL DAC SDK e.g 130, 150. if not set will scan for all versions and the newest used.

inputs.name: OutputVersion
inputs.label: Version number used variable name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The actual version number extracted and used from the build number.
